DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim study determine whether reduced intensity behavioral weight loss treatment ( rBWL ) + Peer Health Coaches yield significantly great weight loss rBWL + Mentor Health Coaches rBWL alone .
DOC.brief_title: Lay Health Coaches Weight Loss : Peers Versus Mentors
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index 30 40 Age 40 60 year English speaking Are unwilling communicate regularly weight loss coach Report able walk 2 block ( 1/4 mile ) without stop Are currently participate weight loss program , take weight loss medication , history bariatric surgery , lose â‰¥ 5 % body weight past 6months Are pregnant , lactate , less 6months postpartum , plan become pregnant intervention timeframe Report heart condition , chest pain period rest activity , loss consciousness Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire Report medical condition would jeopardize safety involve weight management program diet exercise guideline Report condition , judgment PI , would render participant unlikely follow study protocol ( e.g. , relocation , dementia , terminal illness , substance abuse ) .
